effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.2 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 578,190.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,536, further increased by 929 while you remain within its light.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,755 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 204 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Royal Emblem of Nerub-ar
